Package AndeA1_2022

Class Dragon

java.lang.Object
AndeA1_2022.Dragon
public class Dragon extends Object
This is the enemy dragon class. The default dragon is a simple creature with 1000 health and does 20 damage. It can also take damage based on a certain value
Author:
YOURNAME AND STUDENT ID
